sentences.sentence: She was wearing a strand of crystal beads.
The beads are DNA segments wrapped around the histone.
sentences.translation: 这些珠子是包裹在组蛋白上的 DNA 片段。

sentences.sentence: Here you can find bracelets made from special wooden beads, and no two pieces are the same!
sentences.translation: 你可以在这里找到由特殊木珠制成的手镯，每一个都独一无二！
